column1: I wish you and your loved ones a safe and happy Thanksgiving.   While all of our traditions may look different this year may we all find joy gratitude and peace.
It is beyond time to begin the peaceful transition of power to President-elect @JoeBiden

Today democracy prevailed. With the certification of the presidential election results Michigan and our nation can continue to move forward towards uniting around our shared values and vision for the future.
Congratulations to President-Elect @JoeBiden and Vice President-Elect @KamalaHarris! I have no doubt that John Dingell is smiling down on our country today (and giving us this beautiful weather)!
Count. Every. Vote. Period.  Pitting sides against each other is dangerous and unAmerican. https://t.co/Ri3AGCLO1s
Michigan voters know @JoeBiden will deliver for them and we knew Michigan would deliver for Joe Biden. This is a big win! https://t.co/GJOPYjXNru
@TedDeutch Go Blue!
Donald Trump is losing Michigan and this is a desperate attempt to distract from that fact. We must count every ballot. https://t.co/qUEQbi5ZON
Count every vote.
Join me tonight at 8 PM for a post-election zoom to discuss what’s ahead and share how everyone is feeling in this moment. RSVP here: https://t.co/szHhBnU55p https://t.co/dkyuVi8cmd
It’s Election Day! Polls are open today from 7 AM - 8 PM. Questions or concerns? Visit https://t.co/JHHZDdjqjM or call 1-833-MI-VOTES

Don’t fall for voter misinformation! Do your own research and verify the news you see online. Check out https://t.co/B9CELiIHAb or call (866) OUR-VOTE to get accurate information. https://t.co/lGVMXANdjL

Just kicked off a great canvass in Ypsi - we need to make every minute until polls close count. If you haven’t signed up to get out the vote yet we need you! https://t.co/bfw3mGlFs1 https://t.co/DlLvxk7Xc2
@ElissaSlotkin You won fair and square. Sad to see but I will be on the floor in green and white and together we will both still go blue on Tuesday!
.@gretchenwhitmer and I may be rivals on Game Day but come Tuesday we’re both on Team @JoeBiden! Go Blue! https://t.co/1omIciCZHS
Challenge accepted @ElissaSlotkin! Go Blue! https://t.co/odmC8RVuyN https://t.co/D9APPKVL0P

In Michigan we don’t turn away from challenges and we certainly don’t turn toward fear hate and division. We were raised to fight with integrity character and honesty.  And right now America needs Michigan.  https://t.co/x039TjqIZb
Don’t let the polls make you think your vote doesn’t matter. Your vote is the biggest voice you have. Use it.  https://t.co/9oA1THdE5a
Join us for this very exciting virtual event on Friday put on by the Michigan Democratic Women’s Caucus!   Sign up here: https://t.co/oud7n4cdIV https://t.co/iZwvS4mVAs

Today the Senate will vote to confirm Amy Coney Barrett who has a record of disagreeing with the U.S. Supreme Court’s decision upholding the Affordable Care Act.   This administration is endangering the healthcare of millions during a global pandemic and it's unacceptable.
“Hugs” in the age of Covid-19. So glad to welcome my friend @KamalaHarris to Dearborn today! https://t.co/jUsB4WocGo

Join me and Biden’s Deputy National Political Director @JohnWMcCarthy where we'll cover the critical issues our country is facing and how you can get involved to fix them. Tune in: https://t.co/65e3vUYzpN
Healthcare Jobs Civil Rights the Environment and American Democracy. #TeamJoeTalks with @DebDingell & @JoeBiden Deputy Political Director @JohnWMcCarthy on 10/25 @ 1PM E. https://t.co/14skqquLMf
On Sun Oct 25 at 1PM E join me and @JoeBiden Deputy Political Director @JohnWMcCarthy to discuss what's at stake with this election #TeamJoeTalks https://t.co/1ME5pJtE7N

This is the most important election of our lives. On Sun Oct 25 at 1PM E join me and @JoeBiden Deputy Political Director @JohnWMcCarthy to discuss what's at stake with this election #TeamJoeTalks https://t.co/TA3v3cLbCa
Nothing better than starting the day with @garlin at @uawregion1a!  #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/myrOzOduZR
Tonight during #Debate2020 @JoeBiden will speak directly to you about his plan to contain COVID-19 and to build our country back better. Joe has the temperament and decency to lead.
This is the compassionate leadership our country needs right now. @JoeBiden will restore the heart and soul of our nation.  https://t.co/u78mkr1AQ9

.@JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris get it. They see the strain being placed on working families and they have a plan to get through this crisis and to build back better. That's why we must elect the Biden-Harris ticket on Nov. 3. https://t.co/50a3GZiaKr
Right on! #StandUnited https://t.co/kII7gAnGMk
Looking forward to answering all of your questions about voting with @BernieSanders and @RashidaTlaib tonight! https://t.co/a3XcEHNZlQ

When you fill out your ballot make sure you vote your ENTIRE ballot including the nonpartisan section! There you will find the Judicial section where you can vote for @BridgetMaryMc and @WelchForJustice for MI Supreme Court. The nonpartisan section is crucial don't forget it!

Today is also the last day that @JocelynBenson recommends putting your ballot in the mail - after today it's better to turn in your ballot at one of the many local drop boxes. Find yours here: https://t.co/TTFNyDlZj0

Attention Michiganders! Today is the LAST day to register to vote online! After today you'll need to go in-person to your local clerk's office and bring proof of residency. Check your registration at https://t.co/WZmim67oAs & retweet this to make sure your friends check too!

Great being with #CountOnUs @womensmarch in Ann Arbor masked and spaced. Women need to make sure their voices are heard and turnout to vote and I can think of no greater way to honor the women who came before us and opened the doors wider for us. #WomenAreVoting https://t.co/I0L9zBV4Rz
Personal touches make all the difference - especially when we can't be together due to COVID.   Thanks @jimmykimmel for making Lillie's special birthday extra special. https://t.co/qULzAmxybZ

On this National Arab American Voter Day I want to give a shout out to our friends at @EmgageAction for their work with underrepresented communities especially in my hometown of Dearborn. If you're not registered to vote register now at https://t.co/0pEaxiLezm!
To sum up #VPDebate:  VOTE  Vote early  VOTE NOW!  https://t.co/GKtRZ0rBkm

Hate and division are driving this country apart.   @JoeBiden said yesterday in Gettysburg “We can end this era of division. We can end the hate and the fear. We can be what we are at our best: The United States of America.”
This Supreme Court seat - and this election - is about quality healthcare for all Americans.
Again for those in the back.... The Trump Administration is in the Supreme Court right now trying to rip healthcare away from people by overturning the Affordable Care Act.

Joe Biden believes you measure the health of the economy on the strength of the American worker. Trump and Pence measure the health of the economy based on how rich people are doing which is why they passed tax cuts that benefited the wealthy and corporations. #VPDebate

.@JoeBiden has time and again stood on the side of the critical Michigan industry including saving more than 1 million jobs while leading the Obama administration’s auto rescue.   Mike Pence voted against the auto rescue.   #VPDebate
After promising Michiganders the moon there’s been a net loss of over 50000 manufacturing jobs under Trump.   This is the first Administration in generations to oversee a NET JOB LOSS. #VPDebate
Facts: The Trump Administration has rolled back more than 100 environmental protections. That doesn’t help us address climate change.   In fact it makes a bad situation worse.

Pence just called the Affordable Care Act a disaster while this administration has no plan to protect people with preexisting conditions and is actively trying to rip healthcare away from people in the Supreme Court Right now. #VPDebate
Pence said with a straight face they were being transparent. They discouraged mask wearing and said the virus would go away.

Mike Pence is head of the Coronavirus Task Force.   210K Americans have died 30 million on some kind of unemployment and 1 and 5 small businesses are closed.  Mike Pence is head of the Coronavirus Task Force.
Dropped off my absentee ballot at my local drop box this morning! Do you have questions about voting? Visit https://t.co/bAP2VjnV86 to find all the info you need! #MIEarlyVote https://t.co/S7YbB8wMeo

Calling all Michigan college students (that means you @CollegeDemsatUM @EMUCollege_Dems)! @BernieSanders will be speaking directly to you at 1:30 PM today -- sign up at https://t.co/LtFknmJecC to watch. https://t.co/UlAuykmtcw
Tonight civility lost. In America we can disagree without disagreeable. @JoeBiden was strong and speaks to the American people about how we are better than screaming and yelling. #debates2020
Visit https://t.co/Vb2SCK1HdY for more information on early voting.
Election security is fundamental to our democracy. You can vote tomorrow in Michigan. Make a plan to vote and vote early. #Debates2020
@realDonaldTrump has done nothing but stand in the way of electric vehicles.  He has fought an extension of the critical EV tax credit and has hurt the auto industry #Debates2020
Thrilled to hear our next President @JoeBiden lay out a plan for a transition to an electric vehicle future 🚗.  Essential to our economic growth and saving our environment. #Debates2020
This is the first time a question on climate change has been asked at a presidential debate. Trump needs to answer for his administration’s massive rollback of environmental protections. #Debates2020

Since Jan 2017 Michigan has lost over 57000 manufacturing jobs. Even before COVID Michigan plants were closing and a manufacturing recession had begun. I know because I was with the families when they found out right before the holidays their plants were closing. #Debates2020
I don’t feel like in a prison in Michigan I am grateful everyday my  Governor cared. I had family and friends who have died because this White House didn’t address COVID when they should have.
Look no further to see how the system is rigged against working families and in favor of people like Donald Trump... https://t.co/uVAoCVmxr8

Starting TODAY you can vote early in-person at your local clerk’s office. Casting your ballot early is easy just remember to sign the outer envelope before your mail or drop off your ballot. Find out everything you need to know about early voting at https://t.co/WZmim67oAs. https://t.co/X0Eepug0KB

It’s National Voter Registration Day! Go to https://t.co/TTFNyDlZj0 to verify your registration and make sure your family friends and neighbors do the same. This is the most important election of our lifetime so make sure your voice is heard! https://t.co/I2hY5lBl3w
Let us use today to celebrate a great life. Thank you RBG for the difference you made in so many lives. Rest In Peace.

We are mourning the loss of not only a fair and strong jurist but a woman who opened doors wider for every person in this country. Ruth Bader Ginsberg fought for justice and equality deeply American values.
Ballots will be mailed in Michigan starting in just 10 days. Have you requested yours yet? Find everything you need to make your plan to vote at https://t.co/0pEaxiLezm

The Violence Against Women Act is to help save other women from that fear and violence. @JoeBiden led the introduction of VAWA more than 30 years ago and  we need his leadership now.   https://t.co/vdhoIp8pog
Worker safety is important and matters. Have a lot of thoughts from tonight’s visit with @RashidaTlaib that will share when I’ve fully considered them. https://t.co/DRYQ9St9oN

VP @JoeBiden will build our economy back better. Biden & Harris will fix our tax code so it promotes a “Made in America” future and ensures the federal government is delivering on its obligation to use taxpayer dollars to buy American products and support American supply chains.
After promising Michiganders the moon there's been a net loss of over 50000 manufacturing jobs under Trump. We need a President who is committed to American workers and does more than just talk.
Labor Matters. https://t.co/H9iPnrp60o

In 2016 there wasn't a single question on climate change in any of the presidential debates.  This can't happen again.  That's why I signed a letter asking @Debates and the moderators to make climate change a focus of the 2020 debates. Read more: https://t.co/EPGwodn4eV

.@JoeBiden has a plan to safely reopen schools:   ✅Get the virus under control ✅Set national safety guidelines & empower local decisions ✅Provide $ for public schools & childcare providers ✅Ensure quality learning ✅Close the educational equity gap  https://t.co/nRv1rfoUfr

@MariManoogian @JohnDingell 💙
The copy of The Dean by @JohnDingell on the bookshelf bumps it up to a 10/10 for me @MariManoogian! https://t.co/vnMygGgaow

@JoeBiden has announced @KamalaHarris as his running mate! Now on the MI-12 ballot this November we’ll see:  @JoeBiden @KamalaHarris @GaryPeters @DebDingell  With so much on the line this year #TeamDingell is fired up to reach out to voters in MI-12 and we hope you are too!

We cannot take anything about this race for granted and I look forward to turning out the 12th district and all of Michigan for Vice President Biden and Senator Harris in November to protect our country and democracy.

and now we have another momentous nomination. This is the team that will win America in November in the most important election of our lives. Kamala Harris’ experience in the US Senate makes her incredibly qualified and the perfect counterpart for this Democratic ticket.

In Senator @KamalaHarris @JoeBiden has picked a running mate that he knows will be a strong teammate in healing this nation’s heart and soul. We began the Presidential election cycle with a record 6 women running as potential candidates...

A study released by Yale University showed just the opposite – finding "no evidence" that pandemic unemployment benefits were a disincentive to going back to work. Millions of jobless workers depend on these benefits. PEOPLE NEED HELP NOW!!! We have to get this done.

The Republican Senate bill introduced last week proposed returning the tax credit for the three-martini lunch & other business deductions while at the same time claiming that $600 per week in pandemic unemployment benefits are too generous & a disincentive to going back to work.

As Congress looks to pass relief legislation in response to COVID-19 we will be working hard to support significant funding for our schools and ensure the continued safety of our students teachers and staff in any final relief package. This must be a priority.

I am a proud supporter of the Medicare for All Act because universal healthcare can save lives during a global pandemic. I will fight for healthcare coverage of COVID-19 treatments and vaccinations so that no American has to suffer due to lack of financial resources.

I bought lemonade at the corner of Mohawk and Cherry Hill from Fufu the most adorable fundraiser I have met. She is raising money for Lebanon and those that need help. And she understands that at her early age. D2 #LemonadeForLebaneseAid. https://t.co/AHpawkkcCH
The payroll tax funds Social Security and Medicare. By cutting it the President is undermining these essential programs. This isn’t okay.

As John Dingell’s father told him “We don’t inherit the Earth from previous generations we borrow it from future generations.” We must work together to fight the damaging effects of climate change and protect the planet for future generations.
We must protect our postal service. https://t.co/5HNlwJykz6

The Heroes Act will extend weekly $600 federal unemployment payments through next January and provide critical support for renters and homeowners. Time is of the essence and Republicans must work with Democrats to help save lives and livelihoods now.
The COVID-19 pandemic has made the USPS’ role for the American people more important than ever. We must ensure that it continues to function effectively throughout the Coronavirus outbreak.

While teachers & staff are anxious to return to in-person learning they have expressed concerns over the safety of their students families & colleagues at risk of exposure to COVID-19. It is paramount that any plan to reopen schools prioritize the health & safety of everyone.

In the midst of a pandemic we have seen how access to healthcare can be a matter of life & death. That’s why it's important we continue to protect & improve upon our health system. I look forward to the day we pass Medicare for All & guarantee quality care for every American.

For 11 weeks Republicans have blocked critical coronavirus relief & refused to do even the bare minimum needed to seriously address the virus & put out a helping hand to struggling families. Progress isn’t being made the way they need to be. People need help now!
We cannot let this Administration destroy the United States Postal Service.

These reports have increased significantly in the last couple of weeks. We need to make sure we continue to fund our postal service. American democracy and our American way of life that was written into the Constitution depend upon it.

I am becoming increasingly concerned as I receive reports across the district about mail delays mail being piled up people not receiving mail days on end seniors who need their medicine not getting it social check disappearing and stories of what happened to absentee ballots.

The transportation sector accounts for nearly 30% of the carbon emissions. Electric vehicles are of critical importance for reduction of greenhouse gases. The US cannot afford to get behind in innovation and technology.
We can not sit by and simply watch the USPS be destroyed or closed. The House-passed Heroes Act includes $25 billion in emergency appropriations to help the USPS keep its doors open.

As we mark the 55th anniversary of the #VotingRightsAct we’re reminded of John Lewis' sacrifices. If Mitch McConnell wants to pay tribute to his legacy he should hold a vote for the John Lewis Voting Rights Act. Add your name if you agree: https://t.co/MHk4NWvP3l

My district is home to the largest population of Lebanese Americans & many have homes & families still there. I am working with colleagues from both sides of the aisle to seek immediate humanitarian assistance to the Lebanese people to help them recover from this horrible event.

Tens of millions of people are still out of work unemployment benefits are set to expire this week and yet the Republicans insist on not only cutting benefits $400 a week but also doubling the “three martini lunch” tax deduction?

Safe drinking water is a human right. It is critical that every family has access to clean water to reduce the risk of spreading COVID-19.
As a supporter of the Medicare for All Act I will fight for healthcare coverage of COVID-19 treatment and vaccinations. No American should suffer due to inability to cover the costs.

There’s no better way to honor John Lewis’s legacy than to extend the Voting Rights Act. The Senate must bring the John Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act to a vote.

My hometown of Dearborn has the largest population of Arab-Americans in the country. I'm proud to reside in such a culturally rich & diverse community & I'm honored to have received endorsements from The Arab American News AAPAC AMPAC Emgage & the The Yemeni American News. https://t.co/jfIHxkmBwf

Didn’t Trump just attack voting absentee?   Vote early stay safe. https://t.co/emJSZcrqBH

We have seen over 100 environmental regulations get repealed since the President was sworn into office. Climate change is a real and critical threat and it must be addressed as such.

The Senate adjourned until Monday with no action on COVID-19 relief. Federal unemployment benefits expire today. The Heroes Act had been sitting on Sen. McConnell’s desk for weeks. This is absolutely shameful.

Wishing our friends and neighbors celebrating in Michigan and across the country a safe and happy Eid al-Adha.

It’s time for Medicare for All. I promised John the day he died I won’t stop fighting. Together we can all get it done.
He also observed “They’re worried about whether the insurance is going to cover the treatments that they need.” I hear and know too many stories of the fractures in the health care system.“

President Obama continued “But that loss is compounded when you see the stress on their faces because they’re worried that they’re being a burden on their families.” Mine never was I loved him. I was scared.
President Obama spoke this week and said “I know what it’s like to have somebody you love get really sick and in some cases to lose somebody.” I do too.

The students at the 8 colleges and universities in my district are bright vibrant and active people and I love working with and learning from them. These students are only 25% of our population but they're 100% of our future.

A college degree should not come with a staggering amount of debt. We must address this problem make it easier affordable & reduce or eliminate the debt to help young people secure the future they are seeking.

COVID is still here and not going anywhere in the near future. Testing is critical and getting fast results is important so people can be quarantined from contributing to community spread. https://t.co/WTmvxxHEje

“I represent every woman in this country because all of us have had to deal with this in some form in some way in some shape at some point in our lives.”   Thank you @AOC for standing up and speaking out.

The well-being of our seniors is critical. As COVID-19 continues to affect our caregivers it is crucial that we do everything we can to help them. We are working to improve the benefits of our caregivers and ensure our loved ones get the adequate care they need.

An investment in education is an investment in our future and a strong school can make all the difference in a child's life. Education is a public good and we must continue to fight against efforts to divest from our public schools.
Every American has a right to quality healthcare. We need Medicare for All.
@daveweigel The Junk Food Queen welcomes you to Michigan. Square pizza forever!

John Dingell helped create the Land and Water Conservation Fund to protect our national parks and lands. The Great American Outdoors Act will provide permanent full funding for the Fund creating jobs and continuing to protect the lands and species important to our ecosystems.

Policies like the Muslim Travel Ban have no place in the United States. It disrespects our freedom of religion is unconstitutional and has made our country less safe. I am proud to support its repeal.

The Trump Administration has utterly failed to protect the American people from chemicals like PFAS. It is an urgent public health and environment threat and we must commit to continuing to protect the Great Lakes from PFAS and other hazardous chemicals.

It is absolutely critical that we extend unemployment benefits. The last thing Congress should do is allow a critical lifeline like emergency unemployment compensation to expire. This is a crisis we must address now.
I know as President @JoeBiden will make long-term care a priority for working families.

I lived this every day for four years with John. There were days I wanted to bang my head against the wall and didn't know where to turn. Joe and Jill knew what I was going through without me having to say a word and were there to support both of us.
Our country's long-term care system is broken. The fragmented system leaves seniors the disabled and their families desperate stressed and they don't know where to turn.

As Vice-Chair of the Democracy Reform Task Force I fought for the passage of the For the People Act and co-sponsored the Constitutional amendment to overturn Citizens United. I'm proud to have the endorsements of @StopBigMoney and @letamericavote. https://t.co/lYts7tuPtk
The additional unemployment benefits from the HEROES Act are crucial for the hardworking people this pandemic has put out of work.
